tooltip.enchantment-exploration.main.ena: Enables or disables all features of the mod.
tooltip.enchantment-exploration.cost0: The cost of the first enchantment level.
tooltip.enchantment-exploration.cost1: The cost of the second enchantment level.
tooltip.enchantment-exploration.cost2: The cost of the third enchantment level.
tooltip.enchantment-exploration.anvil.to: Toggles if you can combine items with tools in an anvil.
tooltip.enchantment-exploration.anvil.bo: Toggles if you can combine items with enchantment book in an anvil.
tooltip.enchantment-exploration.anvil.va: Toggles if the default repair materials will repair items, or only those in this list.
tooltip.enchantment-exploration.anvil.cu: Additional materials that will repair their specified items.
